    • Uses of SystemClockRecord in com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.meter.service

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SystemClockRecord MeterCmdService.parseRx22Cmd(int[] rx22CmdYear, int[] rx22CmdMonthAndDay, int[] rx22CmdHourAndMinute)
      Parse the TaiDoc Bus command 22 to the SystemClockRecord Note: [0x51,0x22,0x2...]: read the meter clock time, year [0x51,0x22,0x4...]: read the meter clock time, month and day [0x51,0x22,0x6...]: read the meter clock time, hour and minute
      static SystemClockRecord MeterCmdService.parseRx23Cmd(int[] rx23Cmd)
      Parse the TaiDoc Bus command 23 to the SystemClockRecord Note: [0x51,0x21,...]: Read System Clock time
